stages
Class StrategicMovementsStage

java.lang.Object
  stages.StrategicMovementsStage

public class StrategicMovementsStage
extends java.lang.Object

This class has a static method, which is responsible for moving military units to states that need them the most.

Constructor Summary
StrategicMovementsStage()
           
 
Method Summary
static void runStrategicMovementsStage(Country country)
          This method moves military units from safe states to states that have a reinforce flag.
private static void transferMilitaryUnits(State source, State recipient)
          This method transfers military units from the source state to the recipient state.

Method Detail

runStrategicMovementsStage

public static void runStrategicMovementsStage(Country country)
This method moves military units from safe states to states that have a reinforce flag.

Parameters:
country - The country whose turn it is.

transferMilitaryUnits

private static void transferMilitaryUnits(State source,
                                          State recipient)
This method transfers military units from the source state to the recipient state.

Parameters:
source - The state that gives some of its military units.
recipient - The state that receives the military units.
